Package field

Class District

  • java.lang.Object
    • field.District
  • public class District
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents a group of Domains.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      private int color
      The color of this district, serves as an id
      private java.util.ArrayList<Domain> domains
      The list of domains this district contains
      private static int idNum
      ID attribution

      Getter for the color of this district
      java.util.ArrayList<Domain> getDomains()
      Getter for the list of domains in this district
      boolean hotelUniformity()
      Checks if the uniformity rule for hotel is respected : - to build a hotel, there has to be 4 houses in each domain of the district

      Checks if the construction is uniform for the given domain

        Adds the given domain to the list of domains in this district

      • isConstructionUniform

        public boolean isConstructionUniform​(Domain domain)
        Checks if the construction is uniform for the given domain
        Parameters:
        domain - the domain on which its owner would like to build
        Returns:
        true if the construction is uniform, false otherwise

      • hotelUniformity

        public boolean hotelUniformity()
        Checks if the uniformity rule for hotel is respected : - to build a hotel, there has to be 4 houses in each domain of the district
        Returns:
        true if the rule is respected, false otherwise

      • destroyBuildings

        public int destroyBuildings()
        Browse the entire district and destroys each building. The owner gets the selling price of each building in return.
        Returns:
        the total value of the destruction of each building in this district

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Checks if the district is empty (building wise)
        Returns:
        true if the district is empty, false otherwise

        Resets the District id attribution
